title: TEMPORARY TRAFFIC CONTROL
source: Virginia MUTCD for Streets and Highways, Version 11.0 (January 2026)
note: For Temporary Traffic Control, please see the Virginia Work Area Protection Manual (VWAPM). The Virginia MUTCD defers to VWAPM for all work zone and temporary traffic control guidance.

reference.description: Contains all Virginia-specific requirements for temporary traffic control zones, flagging operations, work zone setup, and TTC typical applications.
